qas.question: Due to fighting, what threatened people in the NorthWest?
Who assisted in saving the people from starvation?
Who headed the UN effort to rebuild CAR?
When did CAR request assistance directly to prevent war?
Who assisted CAR in avoiding war?
In what year did Ban Ki-Moon request assistance from the UN?
In what year was the Central African Republic created?

plausible_answers.text: to help countries emerging from conflict avoid devolving back into war or chaos

qas.question: For what purpose was the UN created in 2005?

plausible_answers.text: the Central African Republic was eligible to receive assistance from the Peacebuilding Fund

qas.question: What did the UN Peacebuliding Commission decide on Jan 8, 2008?
How many people were saved from conflict?

context: In 2006, due to ongoing violence, <b9_0>over 50,000<b9_0/> people in the country's northwest were at <a0_0>risk of starvation<a0_0/> but this was averted due to assistance from the <a1_0>United Nations<a1_0/>.[citation needed] On 8 January 2008, the UN <a2_0>Secretary-General Ban Ki-Moon<a2_0/> declared that <b8_0>the Central African Republic was eligible to receive assistance from the Peacebuilding Fund<b8_0/>. Three priority areas were identified: first, the reform of the security sector; second, the promotion of good governance and the rule of law; and third, the revitalization of communities affected by conflicts. <b5_0>On <a3_0>12 June 2008<b5_0/><a3_0/>, the Central African Republic requested assistance from the <a4_0>UN Peacebuilding Commission<a4_0/>, which was set up in <b6_0>2005<b6_0/> <b7_0>to help countries emerging from conflict avoid devolving back into war or chaos<b7_0/>.
